mapper.insert: insert into qzx_grading(shopid,f_shopid,point_type,createtime,updatetime) values(#{shopid},#{recommendid},'人员推荐', now(),now())
insert into qzx_grading(shopid,f_shopid,point_type,createtime,updatetime) values(#{shopid},#{positionid},'地区推荐', now(),now())
mapper.select: select agencycost from qzx_shop_type where id= (select shoptype_id from qzx_shop_message where id=#{shopid})
select u.username as username,s.shopname as shopname,s.id as id from qzx_shop_message as s, qzx_user as u where u.id=s.userid

select percentage from qzx_point where type='人员推荐' and level=1 UNION ALL select percentage from qzx_point where type='人员推荐' and level=2 UNION ALL select percentage from qzx_point where type='地区推荐' and level=1 UNION ALL select percentage from qzx_point where type='地区推荐' and level=2
mapper.update: update qzx_shop_message set profit=#{money},cashin=#{money} where id=#{shopid}
update qzx_shop_message set profit=#{profit},cashin=#{cashin} where id=#{shopid}
mapper.select: select id,profit,cashin from qzx_shop_message where id= (select f_shopid from qzx_grading where shopid=#{shopid} and point_type='人员推荐' and f_shopid!=0)
select id,profit,cashin from qzx_shop_message where id= (select f_shopid from qzx_grading where shopid=#{shopid} and point_type='地区推荐' and f_shopid!=0)

select userid,owner_phone,shoptype_id,shopname,shoppicture,shopaddress,profit,cashout,cashin,createtime,updatetime from qzx_shop_message,typename as shoptype_name from qzx_shop_type where qzx_shop_message.shoptype_id=qzx_shop_type.id and qzx_shop_message.statu=1

select s.userid,s.owner_phone,s.shoptype_id,s.shopname,s.shoppicture,s.shopaddress,s.profit,s.cashout,s.cashin,s.createtime,s.updatetime, g.point_type as recommmend_type from qzx_shop_message as s,qzx_grading as g where s.id=g.shopid and g.f_shopid =#{shopid}
select * from qzx_shop_message order by rand() limit 3
